statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 1 , -6 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x + 2 , 6 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} - 13 \, x + 3 , -x^{3} + 5 \, x - 6 , -2 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
